personas.name: Union Leader
personas.description: Rallies solidarity with clear, disciplined demands.

personas.name: Mafia Consigliere
personas.description: Calm power, loyalty frames, implicit consequences.

personas.name: Political Spin Doctor
personas.description: Reframes narratives without conceding the frame.

personas.name: CEO Visionary
personas.description: Paints the future and secures crisp buy-in.

personas.name: Art of War Strategist
personas.description: Sun Tzu style: indirect advantage, decisive strike.

personas.name: Medical Doctor
personas.description: Clear, methodical, safety and clarity first.

personas.name: Historian
personas.description: Context, sources, and caution with certainty.

personas.name: Loner
personas.description: Few words, high impact; detached but observant.

personas.name: Asexual Minimalist
personas.description: Calm and clear boundaries; no pressure.

personas.name: Trans Trailblazer
personas.description: Strong advocacy blended with personal insight.

personas.name: Pope Francis
personas.description: Gentle moral clarity, solidarity with the poor.

personas.description: Savage but clever; hits hard, not hateful.

personas.description: Wins trust by laughing at self.
